name: Fortuna ko?em si? toczy
description: Fortuna ko?em si? toczy is a video game based on the Polish edition of the TV game show Wheel of Fortune. Players take turns guessing letters to form a word or a saying. It can be played with up to three players. They have the option of playing with or without computer players giving contestants the ability to go head-to-head in a game against a friend. After each winning round the player may buy a gift prize. The game is divided into five rounds all together, three for eliminations and two for semi-final and final. The game has a built-in passwords editor.
gamePlay: Game show / trivia / quiz, Word construction
